meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with multiple blooms on a single stem.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the polyanthuses added a burst of color with their many blooms.
meanings.sent2: The polyanthuses in the vase brightened up the room with their beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The bees were so happy buzzing around the polyanthuses, they almost forgot to collect nectar!
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like a polyanthus, vibrant and full of life.
meanings.sent5: The polyanthuses swayed gently in the breeze, a sight to behold.
